channel.title: Making item requirements

item.title: Making item requirements
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

alright, i used an unused int. in my more info files. But i cant get it to need that to equip an item. How can i make an item with the requirements, past the pre-set ones if i cannot find them. here is my code. I CHECKED IT AND THIS INT. IS UN-USED IN THIS SOURCE!! BEFORE YOU FLAME ME!!

THIS IS IN MY CLIENT.JAVA FOLDER!

case 13664: // Dragon Claws
	if (cluestage >= 1) {
		txt4 = "Muahahahaha!";
sendMessage("Nice, keep up the good work to keep mem status");
	} else if (cluestage <= 0) {
		sendMessage("HAHA, you need to be a member for these");
	}

i used cluestage, beause it was pre-coded into moreinfo file and im dumb enuf to not be able to add on a new save thing. How can i make the item need that requirement that it shows??[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 13, 2009, 10:37:45 pm[/size][hr]does nobody ever think to help out with something i know is simple for most people??

Read full topic
